amendment.description: To provide that the Secretary of the Army may authorize family members of a member of the armed forces on active duty who is occupying military family housing units leased under the exception provided for United States Southern Command personnel to remain in such units while the soldier is assigned to a family-member-restricted area.

action.text: Amendment SA 4539 proposed by Senator Warner.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4539 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
